description: HTML source code for a database visualizer web interface, including styles and client-side scripting for fetching and displaying database and table data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of available databases from the server and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list and resets the view.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data from a selected table and renders it in tabular form.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Dynamically generates HTML for displaying table data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell data, handling objects and long strings with expandable content.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for readability.
